mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile_table (member_idx, profile_job1, profile_job2, profile_school1, profile_school2, profile_text, profile_img) VALUES (#{member_idx}, #{profile_job1}, #{profile_job2}, #{profile_school1}, #{profile_school2}, #{profile_text}, #{profile_img})
mapper.update: UPDATE profile_table SET profile_job1 = #{profile_job1}, profile_job2 = #{profile_job2}, profile_school1 = #{profile_school1}, profile_school2 = #{profile_school2}, profile_text = #{profile_text}, profile_img = #{profile_img} WHERE member_idx = #{member_idx}
